root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 4-1-5, translated into all languages

languages.language: The indicator is available at the national level, by cycle and by sex. ([Primary: Total, Girls, Boys]; [Lower secondary: Total, Girls, Boys]; [Upper secondary: Total, Girls, Boys])

L'indicateur est disponible au niveau national, par cycle et par sexe. ([Primaire: Total, Filles, Garçons]; [Secondaire premier cycle: Total, Filles, Garçons]; [Secondaire 2ème cycle: Total, Filles, Garçons])
